attributes.action: GCSE choices for two subjects from the same faculty
attributes.additional_details: this petition is to help do something about the fact that student choosing their GCSEs are not allowed to take two subjects from the same faculty for example, art, drama, PE, Dance and Music are all in the same faculty but we are not allowed to do, for instance, art and dance, which i think is very unfair so i hope to change this so please sign! thankyou :)
